name: misclassify
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to wrongly say that someone or something is in a particular group or is a particular type: Many workers were misclassified as independent contractors rather than employees of the firm. Doctors may mis-classify very mild symptoms. Related words
classify
misclassification
More examplesFewer examplesThe legislation prohibits employers from misclassifying employees.The company had earlier misclassified some expenses. Their internet provider sometimes misclassifies emails as spam and fails to deliver them. Directors allegedly mis-classified the debt as non-current.
